aws_sqs_queue_policy.description: Provides a SQS Queue Policy resource.

queue_url.description: The URL of the SQS Queue to which to attach the policy

policy.description: The JSON policy for the SQS queue. For more information about building AWS IAM policy documents with Terraform, see the [AWS IAM Policy Document Guide](https://learn.hashicorp.com/terraform/aws/iam-policy).
